name: OM My God
description:
Find your posture and go!

Prepare your mind, relax your spirit and become a yoga master! You may fail a few times along the way, but don’t give up! Try new poses as you get advanced, correct your posture and help others align themselves. Have fun improving your practice and unwind yourself!

Features:

• Relaxing gameplay
• Perfect controls
• Excellent art style
• Engaging levels
